name: VimL
firstLineMatch:
(?x)

# Hashbang
^\#!.*(?:\s|\/|(?<=!)\b)
	(?:vim|nvim)
(?:$|\s)

|

# Modeline
(?i:
	# Vim/Vi modeline, accounting for all possible variations
	(?:(?:\s|^)vi(?:m[<=>]?\d+|m)?|\sex)(?=:(?=\s*set?\s[^\n:]+:)|:(?!\s* set?\s))
	(?:(?:\s|\s*:\s*)\w*(?:\s*=(?:[^\n\\\s]|\\.)*)?)*[\s:]
	(?:filetype|ft|syntax)\s*=
		vim
	(?=\s|:|$)
	
	|
	
	# Emacs modeline, assuming a major mode for VimScript even exists
	-\*-(?:\s*(?=[^:;\s]+\s*-\*-)|(?:.*?[;\s]|(?<=-\*-))mode\s*:\s*)
		(?:Vim|VimL|VimScript)
	(?=[\s;]|(?<![-*])-\*-).*?-\*-
)
